Ravi Chandra Vemuri wrote:
> 
> Dear All,
> 
> I'am new to junit. Can anybody help me to test a
> Webservice using junit,ant & build.xml from
> command prompt? I had tried with the following code.

What kind of problem do you encounter?

Also, I notice that you want to test the /deployed/ web service, rather 
than simply invoking the web service implementation (SampleWs) and 
trying it out. Do you really want to test whether you're deployed the 
web services properly, or do you simply want to test the web service's 
logic? (If it's the latter, then test the logic without deploying it. 
I'm sure web services deployed works in WebLogic, so there's no need for 
you to test it.)
